about_the_game: Play the first world of MageRun
detailed_description: Play the first world of MageRun
name: MageRun Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4570 CPU @ 3.20GHz 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a minimum of 3.22 GB hard disk space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4570 CPU @ 3.20GHz 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Requires a minimum of 3.22 GB hard disk space

short_description: Play the first world of MageRun
supported_languages: English, German, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian
